title.native: じいさんばあさん若返る
title.english: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again

description:
The story of Jii-san Baa-san Wakagaeru follows Shouzou and Ine, an elderly couple who are living a quiet life in a farming village in Aomori Prefecture. After eating a mysterious apple that they discover on their apple farm, Shozo and Ine spontaneously regain their youth, but even after being reinvigorated they continue to live life at a grandparent-ly pace.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)
synonyms: A Story About a Grandpa and Grandma Who Returned Back to Their Youth
おじいさんとおばあさんが若返った話。
Ojiisan to Obaasan ga Wakagaetta Hanashi.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Elderly Protagonist
tags.description: The protagonist is either over 60 years of age, has an elderly appearance, or, in the case of non-humans, is considered elderly for their species.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Snowscape
tags.description: Prominently or partially set in a snowy environment.

title.native: じいさんばあさん若返る

node.description:
__Doujin Circle:__ BAKAYARO
__Currently Residence:__ Hirosaki, Aomori Prefecture, Japan.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/araidokagiri) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=14499092)
Junichirou Suzuki is a music selector.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/runamari)__

__Minoru Hirata__, also known as Shusei, is a Japanese producer, animation planner, lyricist, composer and arranger. He is known to work on various shorter animated projects, usually TV Shorts.

[Profile](https://osawa-inc.co.jp/women/notomamiko/)

A Japanese actress, voice actress, and singer. She is married and has one kid.

**Non-anime roles:**
- Shinano - Azur Lane (VG)
- Emma - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Skirk - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Durandal - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Jun Kazama - Tekken series (VG)
- Mother - Avataro Sentai Donbrothers (Super Sentai) 
- Rella Melancoryphus Cygnus - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Yi Xuan - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

__Height:__ 180 cm
__Agency:__ 81 Produce

[Website](http://www.miki-ha.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/miki_shin318) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/三木眞一郎) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shin-ichiro_Miki)

__Non-anime voice roles:__
- Blade - *Honkai: Star Rail* (2023, Video Game)
- Charizard - *Super Smash Bros. Series* (1999-2018, Video Games)
- Alucard - *Castlevania* (2017, TV Series)
- Jason Bourne - *The Bourne Identity; The Bourne Supremacy; Jason Bourne* (2004; 2007; 2016; Films) (JP Dub)
- Erik Lehnsherr / Magneto - *X-Men: First Class; X-Men: Days of Future Past; X-Men: Apocalypse; Dark Phoenix* (2011; 2014; 2016; 2019; Films) (JP Dub)
- Lee - *Arknights* (Video Game)
- Kamejim - *Ohsama Sentai King-Ohger* (2023, TV series)

__[Website](https://koresawa.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/koresawa_519) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/koresawa519/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCY47aDuWPpH18NJlidLg04A)__

__Introduction:__
Koresawa is a singer-songwriter. She does not show her face publicly outside of concerts, and is visually represented by the character "Reko" (れ子) designed by artist Uchibori Shinpe.

On October 13, 2017, Koresawa formed the Yuru-Chara Band "Korechanzu (コレちゃんズ)" alongside the mascots; [Shinjokun](https://w.wiki/9qL$), [Sanomaru](https://w.wiki/58zh) and [Unarikun](https://w.wiki/9qM3).
